HomePage.title: Hello world!
HomePage.callToAction: Join us in rediscovering joy and vitality in every moment!
HomePage.introduction: At Latin Ageing UK, we empower individuals aged 50 and over to embrace vibrant social lives and enhance their well-being. Our engaging activities foster connection, creativity, and a sense of community. From fitness classes to cultural outings, we provide opportunities for personal growth and friendship, ensuring that every participant feels valued and inspired.
HomePage.discoverMore: Discover more about BLAS UK on the Southwark Council website
HomePage.download: And download a free downloadable booklet with more information about the Bolivian Latin Ageing Association - as well as other organisations and services in Southwark that support healthy ageing for residents aged 50+.
